testcase.name: To Verify if the user clicks on the upgrade button present on pricing plan page or on the pie-chart he is able to upgrade the new Plan through banchub page.
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-dev.exela.global/#/".................passed When enter the user name as "sid87@mailinator.com"..........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the Login button..........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed Then user click on Upgrade button...........................................passed And click on Upgrade........................................................passed Then user navigate to payment page..........................................passed And user enter name of the card as "Test"...................................passed And enter card number as "4242424242424242".................................passed And enter expire month as "07"..............................................passed And enter expire year as "27"...............................................passed And enter cvv nunber as "789"...............................................passed Then user click on pay button...............................................passed Then confirmation message get display as "PAYMENT CONFIRMATION".............passed
